AgentRuntimeId.description: The ID of the parent Agent Runtime
AgentRuntimeId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the parent Agent Runtime

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]{0,99}-[a-zA-Z0-9]{10}$  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentRuntimeEndpointId.description: The unique ID of the Agent Runtime Endpoint itself
AgentRuntimeEndpointId.markdownDescription:
The unique ID of the Agent Runtime Endpoint itself

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

EndpointName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 48  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]{0,47}$  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentRuntimeVersion.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^([1-9][0-9]{0,4})$  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentEndpointDescription.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentRuntimeEndpointArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws:bedrock-agentcore:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]{12}:runtime/[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+/runtime-endpoint/[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentRuntimeArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:(-[^:]+)?:bedrock-agentcore:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]{12}:agent/[A-Fa-f0-9]{8}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{12}:([0-9]{0,4}[1-9][0-9]{0,4})$  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentRuntimeEndpointStatus.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CREATING | CREATE_FAILED | UPDATING | UPDATE_FAILED | READY | DELETING  
Update requires: No interruption

DateTimestamp.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

TagsMap.description: A map of tag keys and values

^[a-zA-Z0-9\\s._:/=+@-]*$.markdownDescription:
Value of a tag

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s._:/=+@-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

TagsMap.markdownDescription:

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption
